items.name: Chakalaka Arancini
items.description: Crispy risotto balls filled with spicy chakalaka, served with a cooling yogurt dip.

items.name: Biltong Carpaccio
items.description: Thinly sliced cured beef with rocket, parmesan, and a drizzle of olive oil.

items.name: Rooibos-Braised Lamb Shank
items.description: Slow-cooked lamb shank in a rooibos and tomato gravy, served with creamy pap.

items.name: Cape Malay Chicken Curry
items.description: Tender chicken in a fragrant Cape Malay curry sauce, served with yellow rice and sambals.

items.name: Grilled Kingklip
items.description: Fresh kingklip fillet grilled and served with lemon butter sauce and seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Malva Pudding
items.description: Classic South African sponge pudding with apricot jam, served warm with custard.

items.name: Milk Tart
items.description: Traditional creamy milk tart with a dusting of cinnamon.
